Getting started

  1. Add carcass to your npm dependencies.
  2. Structure your project with the help of "register". Example: https://github.com/Wiredcraft/carcass-couch/blob/master/src/index.coffee
  3. Config your project with "Carcass Config". (I'm building an example)
  4. Build servers and commands with "Carcass Program".
  5. Test your project with the help of "Carcass Monitor".
  6. Deploy with your favourite process manager, e.g. forever, pm2.
